Text: GABE, If you don't mind me asking what converter did you use to make this file an mkv? Yours and all of publicHDs iTunes sourced web-dls play on my media player but when I download from iTunes myself I can't get them to play. Won't play as the original mp4 file, won't play if I use mkvmerge, Handbrake loses quality so I do not know what else to try.
